label: Behavior 60625639
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: anchored or moored in a confined area (the persistent zero speed with varying COG while heading remains constant indicates the vessel is stationary but swinging due to tidal or wind forces; position remains nearly constant at latitude: 56.151458, longitude: 10.236068, forming a point-like trajectory with no significant displacement, consistent with anchoring or mooring behavior)

Heading fluctuation: stable (the heading remains fixed at 41.0° throughout the observation period, even as COG changes, indicating the vessel is not actively steering)

Behavior intent: anchored or moored in a confined area (the persistent zero speed with varying COG while heading remains constant indicates the vessel is stationary but swinging due to tidal or wind forces; position remains nearly constant at latitude: 56.151458, longitude: 10.236068, forming a point-like trajectory with no significant displacement, consistent with anchoring or mooring behavior)
